review: I met Dr. Sameer Sadawarte in Fortis hospital Mulund for my two months old son treatment. ** ** **** ******** ******** **** ******* Also have good attitude.. explains very well.. very transparent doctor.
My kid had cough from 3 months.. he was very polite.. explained the underlying issue with use of medicine and wat each medicine does. Took time to thorough explain and see my kid
